description: The conference features 9 outstanding speakers from all over the globe who will be unpacking topics related to front-end development and design in the context of open-source, enterprise, cloud, development experience, inclusion, and user experience.

This year we have a total of 14 talk sessions with 19 speakers from 7 countries sharing their expertise through sessions and Q&A. Whether you are a junior in the field or an advanced thinker of your domain, there is a session for every level of expertise!
